hero.title: Hi, I’m Egah
hero.subtitle:
Robotics & Artificial Intelligence Student (8th Semester)
Autonomous Systems • Computer Vision • Technical Leadership
hero.tagline: Building intelligent systems with real-world impact.

about.text: I am a Robotics and Artificial Intelligence student at Universitas Airlangga with strong interests in autonomous robots, computer vision, and artificial intelligence. My journey combines technical development, leadership experience, and real-world applications.

journey.title: Foundation Year
journey.short: Started Robotics & AI studies at Universitas Airlangga.
journey.description: This year marked the beginning of my academic journey in Robotics and Artificial Intelligence, focusing on foundational engineering and programming skills.

journey.title: Exploration & Achievement
journey.short: Active in robotics community and national competition.
journey.description: I joined the ABU Robocon team as a junior programming support, served as treasurer of the robotics community, and achieved a Silver Medal at PIMNAS 36.

journey.title: Leadership & Industry
journey.short: Leading robotics teams and learning industry ML.
journey.description: I led the ABU Robocon team, became the head of the robotics community, and completed the Bangkit Academy Machine Learning Path.

journey.title: Impact & Contribution
journey.description: Serving as Minister of Professional Development and participating in community empowerment programs supported by the Ministry of Higher Education.

contact.text: Interested in collaboration, research discussion, or professional opportunities?
